template<class T>
T* Step::RefPtr< T >::release (  )  [inline]

take control over the object pointed to by RefPtr, unReferenced but do not delete even if ref count goes to 0, return the pointer to the object. Note, do not use this unless you are 100% sure your code handles the deletion of the object correctly, and only use when absolutely required.
